title: >>> Dodgeball DATA
body_text:
These past six months have been filled with "career" altering occurances and outcomes. "Truths" about the game have finally come out right here on the dodgeball website. The past comes back to life in further preparation for the biggest event of them all this Sunday ...
~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~
"Dodgeball DATA"
Part I
> There have been 22 Saturday events, six Friday events, and one Sunday event. DODGEBALL 30 will be only the second event hosted on a Sunday. Of the three "ten" events (X, 20, 30), none of them have taken place on a Saturday.
> DODGEBALL 15 was the last event played at Ocean Road Park. DODGEBALL X6 started the days at Wall High School.
> There have been five "Wet Wars":
DODGEBALL VII [10/08/05]
DODGEBALL 9 [10/22/05]
DODGEBALL TWENTY-TWO [01/14/06]
DODGEBALL XXV [02/04/06]
DODGEBALL TWENTY-SIX [02/11/06]
> Since the inception, there have been 122 players total; 86 men and 36 women.
> Using first names, the first player alphabetically is Aimee Savoth. The last is Zach Katz.
> The two most common names in dodgeball are "Matt" and "John", both tied at six. "Chris" is runner-up with five. For the ladies, "Lauren" takes the top spot with three.
> The only two events that did not have new players were DODGEBALL XXIV and DODGEBALL TWENTY-SIX. The events with the most new players were DODGEBALL DAY 2 and DODGEBALL XXV, both with an astounding 11.
> The first captains match was Valerie Winston vs. Lauren Winston at DODGEBALL DAY 1.
> The only captains battle to feature inter-gender captains was at DODGEBALL X6; Ryan McCrorey vs. Sara DeCuir.
> Despite being 7th on the all-time "Most Events Played" list, Mike "Sputz" has never been captain.
> The only two events in which Lauren Freda and Chris Adams were on opposing sides were DODGEBALL 9 and DODGEBALL 17.
> The largest turnout of female players was at DODGEBALL 20 with 11.
> "Dark" Dodgeball was created at DODGEBALL 17. "Speed" Ball was created at DODGEBALL 20.
> The tallest player ever is Mike "Rozz" Rosinski standing at 6'8".
> The first event to include pictures was DODGEBALL 8. Video footage didn't come until DODGEBALL 20.
> Diana DiBuccio vs. Justin Pierce was named "Best Rivalry" at DODGEBALL X. Mike Rosinski vs. Liz Nogueira would have been the runner-up.
> The original, unreleased name of the "Powerhouse Thrower" award was actually the "Rocket-Fueled" award.
> Rejected DODGEBALL 20 theme songs included Drowning Pool's "Step Up", U2's "Vertigo", among others.
> There have been two "invasions"; "The Rats" at D-DAY 5 and [what looked to be] Ocean Township High School students at DODGEBALL XXIV.
> The dodgeball documentary "Not JUST a Game" was fully completed by DODGEBALL XXIV.
> DODGEBALL 9 was the first event to have its results posted here on the dodgeball website. Prior to that, all previous events' results were posted on John Tronolone's personal live journal:
DODGEBALL DAY 1:
http://wwecoowner.livejournal.com/2005/09/04/
DODGEBALL DAY 2:
http://wwecoowner.livejournal.com/2005/09/09/
DODGEBALL DAY 3:
http://wwecoowner.livejournal.com/2005/09/14/
DODGEBALL DAY 4:
http://wwecoowner.livejournal.com/2005/09/18/
D-DAY 5:
http://wwecoowner.livejournal.com/2005/09/26/
D-DAY VI:
http://wwecoowner.livejournal.com/2005/10/03/
DODGEBALL VII:
http://wwecoowner.livejournal.com/2005/10/09/
DODGEBALL 8:
http://wwecoowner.livejournal.com/2005/10/16/
~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~
~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~
"Dodgeball DATA"
Part II
- - MOST EVENTS PLAYED - -
1. Diana DiBuccio (27)
1. Steve Adams (27)
3. Justin Pierce (26)
3. Chris Adams (26)
5. Dan Spengeman (24)
5. Lauren Freda (24)
7. Mike "Sputz" Krott (23)
8. Valerie Winston (22)
9. Ryan McCrorey (19)
9. Kevin Adams (19)
9. Tom Adams (19)
9. Lenny Herrera (19)
13. Kyle Carty (18)
13. Alison Bertsch (18)
15. Derek Carty (17)
- - LONGEST STRING OF EVENTS - -
1. Justin Pierce (26 events in a row) [DAY 2 to DODGEBALL 27]
2. Steve Adams (22 events in a row) [DAY 2 to DODGEBALL 23]
3. Dan Spengeman (21 events in a row) [DAY 3 to DODGEBALL 23]
4. Diana DiBuccio (19 events in a row) [DAY 1 to DODGEBALL 19]
4. Chris Adams (19 events in a row) [DAY 3 to DODGEBALL 21]
4. Lenny Herrera (19 events in a row) [DODGEBALL XONE to Present]
7. Tom Adams (17 events in a row) [DODGEBALL 8 to DODGEBALL XXIV]
8. Kevin Fitzpatrick (14 events in a row) [DODGEBALL XTWO to DODGEBALL XXV]
- - HIGHEST ATTENDANCES - -
1. DODGEBALL XTWO = 42 players [11/05/05]
2. DODGEBALL 15 = 37 players [11/26/05]
2. DODGEBALL 20 = 37 players [12/30/05]
4. DODGEBALL XONE  = 33 players [11/04/05]
4. DODGEBALL 13 = 33 players [11/12/05]
- - LOWEST ATTENDANCES - -
1. DODGEBALL DAY 1 = 12 players [09/03/05]
2. DODGEBALL TWENTY-SIX = 14 players [02/11/06]
3. DODGEBALL VII = 15 players [10/08/05]
4. DODGEBALL DAY 2 = 16 players [09/04/05]
5. DODGEBALL 9 = 19 players [10/22/05]
~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~
Dodgeball DATA is complete ... for now.
In just days time, John Tronolone will make his "DODGEBALL 30 Address".
